plot outline: Ajaraamara is a family entertainer with its share of romance and comedy. The film revolves around a multi-talented orphan with no goals in life. What happens when an independent woman enters his life and how his life changes due to this forms the crux of the story.
title: Ajaramara
plot: multi-talented orphan with no goals in life. And what happens when an independent woman enters his life and how his life changes due to this.

Ajaraamara is a family entertainer with its share of romance and comedy. The film revolves around a multi-talented orphan with no goals in life. What happens when an independent woman enters his life and how his life changes due to this forms the crux of the story.
